snippet.title: Legendary Creatures 2 | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Sequel to the acclaimed strategy franchise Legendary Creatures 2 #Steam page live now, accompanied by the first-ever public #demo with language support in English, Japanese, and Chinese!

🎮Play demo of Legendary Creatures 2 NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2233790
✅Follow the dev on Twitter: https://twitter.com/HideChara1
✅Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/r8GkE9Ea

Combining rogue-lite features and auto-battler gameplay, Legendary Creatures 2 invites you into an immersive open-world adventure, where unending possibilities await. Explore different landscapes, recruit creatures of legend, and wield their powers as you embark on an epic quest to conquer the formidable demon lord. Prepare for an unforgettable journey with modding support coming soon!⚔️⚔️⚔️

Game Features:

- Unleash your adventurous spirit on a randomly generated map, brimming with threats and surprises.
- Create unique skill combinations from a diverse pool, thanks to the main and sub-class system.
- Dive into the equipment system and upgrade gear with gems that offer a variety of effects.
- Unlock new map facilities as you conquer each difficulty level, ensuring fresh challenges.
- Discover a plethora of creatures, skills, items, and facilities.
- Modding support will be implemented into the game later, simple and flexible just like the previous title.
#indiegame #games
